meanings.definition: Cooked in a souffle style, typically light and fluffy.
meanings.sent1: The souffleed cake was so light and fluffy that it practically floated off the plate.
meanings.sent2: The chef served a souffleed omelette that was perfectly puffed up.
meanings.sent3: I tried to make a souffleed pancake, but it ended up looking more like a cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her souffleed dessert was a heavenly creation that melted in your mouth.
meanings.sent5: The souffleed cheese souffle was a delicate masterpiece of culinary art.

meanings.definition: To prepare or make a dish in the style of a souffle.
meanings.sent1: She souffleed the eggs with precision to create a fluffy texture.
meanings.sent2: The chef souffleed the mixture before baking it to perfection.
meanings.sent3: He souffleed the souffle so expertly that it rose like a magic trick.
meanings.sent4: The baker souffleed the pastry, turning it into a golden delight.
meanings.sent5: They souffleed the dessert, transforming it into a work of art on a plate.
